name: head hunting.
description:
A man has been captured and executed by the round court of Angels.

You are not that man's skull, with your one arm climb your way to the home of the angel that sentenced you to death and assassinate him.

---------------------------------------------

Keyboard controls:

Left/Right/A/D - Move

Space/Z - Jump/Grab

Gamepad controls:

Left stick - Move

A - Jump/Grab

---------------------------------------------

I made this game in about a week for Pixel Day 2023 on Newgrounds, with the hopes to do more cinematic based games.

Made with GDevelop

Hope you enjoy it.
